```{r}
library(readr)
glycanDatabase <- read_csv("data/glycanDatabase.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```


```{r}
ind <- sample(nrow(glycanDatabase), 1)
wurcs <- glycanDatabase$StructureInformation[ind]

ind <- which(grepl("a4334h-1a_1-4", glycanDatabase$StructureInformation))[1]
wurcs <- glycanDatabase$StructureInformation[ind]
id <- glycanDatabase$GlycanID[ind]
wurcs

img_url <- paste0("https://image.glycosmos.org/snfg/png/", id)
knitr::include_graphics(img_url)

# show tree structrue
list_1 <- wurcs %>% wurcs_to_tree()
pGlyco3_form <- tree_to_pGlyco3(list_1)
list_2 <- pGlyco3_form %>% pGlyco3_to_tree()

list_1 %>% get_igraph_tree() %>% show_igraph_tree()
list_2 %>% get_igraph_tree() %>% show_igraph_tree()
```

```{r}
trait1 <- get_trait(list_1)
trait2 <- get_trait(list_2)
identical(trait1, trait2)
unlist(trait1)
unlist(trait2)
```
